title: 2022 Midterm Election Debate: Gerald Malloy and Rep. Peter Welch for U.S. Senate
description: Vermont Edition host Mikaela Lefrak moderates a debate with the candidates for U.S. Senate: Republican Gerald Malloy and Democrat Rep. Peter Welch.
